flavorText: The first memory it sucks out of its host is how to get rid of it.

foreignData.flavorText: Das allererste, was es aus dem Gedächtnis seines Opfers herausfischt, ist, wie man es loswerden kann.
foreignData.name: Gedankenfutterer
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Deine maximale Handkartenzahl ist um drei reduziert.

foreignData.flavorText: El primer recuerdo que absorbe de su huésped es cómo deshacerse de él.
foreignData.name: Comepensamientos
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
El tamaño máximo de tu mano se reduce en tres.

foreignData.flavorText: Le premier souvenir qu'il vous vole, c'est celui qui vous aurait permis de vous débarrasser de lui.
foreignData.name: Mangeur de pensées
foreignData.text:
Vol
La taille maximale de votre main est réduite de trois.

foreignData.flavorText: La prima memoria che succhia via è come sbarazzarsi di lui.
foreignData.name: Mangiapensieri
foreignData.text:
Volare
Il numero massimo di carte che puoi tenere in mano è ridotto di tre.

foreignData.flavorText: A primeira memória que ele suga de seu hospedeiro é a de como se livrar dele.
foreignData.name: Engolidor de Pensamentos
foreignData.text:
Voar
O número máximo permitido de cards em sua mão é reduzido em três.

name: Thought Eater
originalText:
Flying
Your maximum hand size is reduced by three.

rulings.text: If multiple effects modify your hand size, apply them in timestamp order. For example, if you are affected by Cursed Rack (an artifact that sets a player’s maximum hand size to four) and then put Thought Eater onto the battlefield, your maximum hand size would be one. However, if those permanents entered the battlefield in the opposite order, your maximum hand size would be four.

text:
Flying
Your maximum hand size is reduced by three.
